description: A youkai who protects the descendant of his lord, he was a loyal samurai who was betrayed by his lord`s wife out of jealousy but as he died from a flood while being trapped in prison he was so concerned over protecting him, he became a youkai. Part of Rikuo`s new "Hyakki Yakou", he is currently fighting alongside the Nura household against Kyoto youkai. He fought Tsuchigumo
name: Jami
